numbered_ace_sentences: 1. I noticed that the WNBA has many players of color.
2. I noticed that the NBA has many players of color.
3. I wonder why most managers are not people of color.
4. I wonder why the MLB has fewer players of color.
6. If kids see players of color, then kids can be inspired.
7. If kids see players of color, then kids can be encouraged to play sports.
8. Kids can look up to players of color.
9. The headline is: White people still want control?: Graph about players of color.
